cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.NA, cs.DS, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of robust regression, which is a common topic in machine learning and statistics. The use of hard thresholding and gradient descent algorithms suggests that the paper is likely to be in the category of machine learning (cs.LG) or information theory (cs.IT). The focus on large-scale problems and sparse recovery suggests that the paper may also be relevant to numerical analysis (cs.NA) and data structures (cs.DS). Finally, the empirical evaluation of the proposed method suggests that the paper may also be relevant to social and information networks (cs.SI), as these domains often involve large-scale data analysis.
